channel.title: CVE Feed for ishitaka -- XO Slider
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ishitaka -- XO Slider

item.title: CVE-2024-8324|2024-10-01T08:30:17.967Z -- ishitaka -- xo%20slider
item.description: The XO Slider plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘get_slider’ function in all versions up to, and including, 3.8.6 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
